infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: Lumis tracks your steps to reward you for staying active outdoors.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Lumis uses your location to provide real-time weather and UV data for your exact position.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Lumis uses your location to track outdoor time and provide weather updates.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Lumis uses the camera sensor to accurately measure ambient light levels and optimize your light intake.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Lumis uses the microphone for enhanced interaction features.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: Lumis uses FaceID to secure your app lock settings.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Lumis reads your outdoor activity and steps from HealthKit to track your daily progress automatically.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Lumis can sync your outdoor light exposure activities back to the Health app.
infoPlist.NSFamilyControlsUsageDescription: Lumis uses Screen Time access to help you block distracting apps during your morning light routine to ensure you stay focused.
